task.prompt: Let $P$ be the plane passing through the origin with normal vector $\begin{pmatrix} 1 \\ 1 \\ -1 \end{pmatrix}.$  Find the matrix $\mathbf{R}$ such that for any vector $\mathbf{v},$ $\mathbf{R} \mathbf{v}$ is the reflection of $\mathbf{v}$ through plane $P.$
